subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The 149-day N.B.A. lockout was mostly about money, but with a subtext of control. The owners ultimately failed to regain it and the star players appear to be as powerful as ever.
snippet: The 149-day N.B.A. lockout was mostly about money, but with a subtext of control. The owners ultimately failed to regain it and the star players appear to be as powerful as ever.
